modName: Cloaks Magic - Longer Lasting Cloak Spells
summary:
Makes using cloak spells less annoying!

Now cloak spells last 3min upon cast (instead of 1min)!
descriptionHtml:
Makes using cloak spells less annoying!

Now cloak spells last 3min upon cast (instead of 1min)!


Try my other mod!
Reduced FX from cloak spells: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48893/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48893/[/url]


This mod is also available on Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=204599560
